list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an aromatic plant native to temperate regions of the Old World, several kinds of which are used as culinary herbs.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: plant mint in a large pot with drainage holes
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: MINT thực vật trong một nồi lớn có lỗ thoát nước

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Dickie pulled out a packet of mints from his pocket
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Dickie rút ra một gói bạc hà từ túi của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a place where money is coined, especially under state authority.
(of an object) in pristine condition; as new.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: a pair of speakers including stands, mint, $160
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Một cặp loa bao gồm đứng, bạc hà, $ 160

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: only coins of a relatively high denomination were minted
